content.text:
[@Thunder](@bjhAzmwQmu1+dqKmrixfDh91zdILPEQc8L1gmFYJLdA=.ed25519) 

- **Back:** `CommandOrControl` + `[` 
- **Forward:** `CommandOrControl` + `]`

Explanation on why we're using both `Command` *and* `Control` as options:

> On Linux and Windows, the `Command` key does not have any effect so use `CommandOrControl` which represents `Command` on macOS and `Control` on Linux and Windows to define some accelerators.

> -- [Electron documentation](https://electronjs.org/docs/api/accelerator#platform-notice)
